Title: Otelo Burning
Writer: James Whyle, Sara Blecher, Justine Loots (narration writer)
Actors: Jafta Mamabolo, Thomas Gumede, Sihle Xaba, Tshepang Mohlomi
Plot: When 16 year old Otelo Buthelezi, his best friend, New Year, and his 12 year old brother, Ntwe, are invited to the beach-house of their new friend, Tau Modise, they step into a world ...
